selection.empty: Please select at least one entry.

reorder-entries.description: Please, define the starting position of the entry number:

position-labels.beginning: At the beginning of the list
position-labels.end: At the end of the list

variables.confirm.delete.title: Delete confirmation
variables.confirm.delete.warning: Specified variable(s) already have data associated. Do you want to proceed?
variables.already.exsits: Specified variable is already associated to the list

file.input.description: Choose the file you would like to import in format: Excel

validation.file.empty: Wrong name for Observation sheet or the file has no data. Please verify and try again
validation.extensions: Only the following file extensions are allowed: {{param}}
validation.header: At least GID, GUID or DESIGNATION column is required
validation.gid.format: Some GID values are not a positive integer. Please correct them and try again
validation.unknown.column: Some columns were not recognized in the system or are not relevant to the import list and were thus ignored ({{param}})
validation.entry.code: ENTRY_CODE column should either be specified for all entries, or not at all
validation.entry.details.no.column: No suitable column found for entry detail variables. Please check the Entry Details sheet
validation.entry.no.format: Some ENTRY_NO values are not a positive integer. Please correct them and try again
validation.entry.no.duplicates: Some ENTRY_NO values are duplicated. Please correct them and try again

matches.description: Multiple matches were found for the following ROW #: {{row}} using NAME: {{name}} ({{matchNumber}} of {{unassignedCount}}). Please provide a mapping. Unmapped records will be omitted.
No matches were found for the following records. Please provide a mapping. Unmapped records will be omitted.

review.description: The system has matched using the following priority: GUID if available, then GID if available and lastly DESIGNATION

summary.title: Confirmation
summary.ignored: {{param}} entries with matches were ignored (new records will be created)

import.cancel.confirm: Are you sure you want to quit the import process?
